Name: History & Nobility
Ingredients: 7.5 ml De Kuyper Apricot Brandy liqueur
Instructions: Select and pre-chill a Coupe glass .
Prepare garnish of lemon zest twist.
EXPRESS lemon zest twist over the cocktail and use as garnish.
Review: Cognac stirred with orange and apricot liqueurs along with a dash of orange bitters. The original recipe calls for two dashes but go too heavy with your bitters and this subtle drink will be wrecked. Achieving perfect dilution is also key, hence our adding half a shot chilled water (ice allowing of course).
History: Adapted from a recipe created in 2015 by Daniel Bovey at Be At One, Bristol, England.
Nutrition: One serving of History & Nobility contains 149 calories
